name: Black Dragon
description: Acid Breath: At the start of this creatures turn every player must roll a dice. On a roll of 2 or less they must destroy one card from their hand at random. On a roll of 3 or more they take 3 damage.
flavor: “Always speak politely to an enraged dragon. Begging for your life may also help, but we have had trouble finding evidence to back our theory.”
